headline: Canada Offers Automakers Tariff Exemption on Imports
summary: Canada said that automakers will be allowed to continue to import a certain number of US-made cars and trucks, tariff-free, provided they keep manufacturing vehicles in the country. Keith Naughton reports on Bloomberg Television.
